ComicInfo.Title: Death's Head Revisited
ComicInfo.Summary:
He is the robotic bounty hunter Death’s Head. He is a mercenary for hire. And if you’re within his range, then all you need to know is that escape is futile.
8162, beneth the surface of Greater Britain. Death's Head is recovered by the Chain Gang and rebuilt by Spratt. Several weeks later and on the surface Death's Head becomes a 'freelance peace keeping agent' hunting down his clients targets, never for free of course.Just don't call him a bounty hunter, yes?
"Never kill for free and never turn down a contract - whoever the target is!"
